mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pill mould or roller
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A tag with the following text accompanies the artifact: "Pill mould, Dr. Albert Worthington". Dr. Albert Brownell Worthington (1819-1898) graduated from Yale Medical School (1847) and practiced medicine in Middle Haddam, Connecticut from 1847 to 1898. The pill roller may have been owned by earlier physicians. N. Laws[ ].
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Pharmaceutical technology
